Since Ratchet & Clank came out in 2016, I've been thinking of Sega and Paramount Animation hiring Kevin Munroe to direct a theatrical animated Sonic The Hedgehog film. The main characters would be once again played by their original voice actors while celebrity actors would cast in supporting roles. The first film would be based on the first Sonic Adventure video game.

Roger Craig Smith - Sonic The Hedgehog

Colleen O'Shaughnessy - Miles "Tails Prower"

Dave B. Mitchell - Knuckles

Cindy Robinson - Amy Rose

Mike Pollock - Dr. Eggman.

Dane DeHaan - Metal Sonic.

Miley Cyrus - Tika

Scott Adsit - E102-Gamma.

Josh Brolin - Pachacamac

Seth Rogen - Big The Cat.

If the movie is successful enough to guarantee sequels.

Kirk Thornton - Shadow The Hedgehog

Maia Mitchell - Rouge The Bat.

McKenna Grace - Maria Robotnik.

Tim Allen as the President.

Colin Ford - Christopher Thorndyke.

Taylor Swift - Sally Acorn

Katherine McNarama - Elise The Third.

Ed Helms - Mephiles the Dark.

Danny Devito - Elise's father

Logen Lerman - Sliver The Hedgehog

Hailee Steinfield - Blaze the Cat
